org.tsugi

Interface User

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseUser

    public interface User
    This is a class to provide access to the data for the logged-in user This data comes from the LTI launch from the LMS. If this is an anonymous launch the User will be null.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int INSTRUCTOR_ROLE 
      static int LEARNER_ROLE 
      static int ROOT_ADMIN_ROLE 
      static int TENANT_ADMIN_ROLE

      The user's email

      Launch getLaunch()
      Get the launch associated with this object

      Is the user an instructor?
      boolean isMentor()

      boolean isRootAdmin()
      Is the user a Tsugi-wide Administrator?

      Is the user a Tenant Administrator?
